00010   CellNeighbourCalculator::CellNeighbourCalculator(const Mapper* mapper) : _mapper(mapper) {
00011   }

00014   void CellNeighbourCalculator::checkForCell(const unsigned int i, const unsigned int j, const unsigned int k, std::set<int>& cellIDset) const {
00015     int cellID = -1;
00016     try {
00017       cellID = _mapper->getTrueCellID( _mapper->getDecoder()->getCellID(i,j,k) ) ;
00018     }
00019     catch ( BadDataException& ) {
00020     }
00021     if (cellID != -1) cellIDset.insert(cellID);
00022   }
00023 
00024   CellNeighbours* CellNeighbourCalculator::getNeighbours(const int cellID) const {
00025 
00026     unsigned int I = _mapper->getDecoder()->getIFromCellID(cellID);
00027     unsigned int J = _mapper->getDecoder()->getJFromCellID(cellID);
00028     unsigned int K = _mapper->getDecoder()->getKFromCellID(cellID);
00029     unsigned int Isize = _mapper->getISizeFromCellID(cellID);
00030     unsigned int Jsize = _mapper->getJSizeFromCellID(cellID);
00031 
00032     std::string encoding = _mapper->getDecoder()->getCellIDEncoding();
00033 
00034     // std::cout << "CellNeighbours getNeighbours of cellID " << cellID << std::endl;
00035     // std::cout << "Encoding string " << encoding << std::endl;
00036     // std::cout << "I/J/K " << I << " " << J << " " << K << std::endl;
00037     // std::cout << "I size " << Isize << " J size " << Jsize << std::endl;
00038 
00039     std::set<int> directNeighboursModule;
00040     std::set<int> directNeighboursForward;
00041     std::set<int> directNeighboursBackward;
00042     std::set<int> cornerNeighboursModule;
00043     std::set<int> cornerNeighboursForward;
00044     std::set<int> cornerNeighboursBackward;
00045 
00046 
00047     for (unsigned int i = I-1; i < I + Isize + 1; ++i )
00048     for (unsigned int j = J-1; j < J + Jsize + 1; ++j ) {
00049       if ( ( i >= I ) && ( i < I + Isize ) && ( j >= J ) && ( j < J + Jsize ) ) { // within cell area
00050         checkForCell(i, j, K-1, directNeighboursBackward);
00051         checkForCell(i, j, K+1, directNeighboursForward);
00052       }
00053       else if ( ( i < I ) && ( ( j < J ) || ( j >= J + Jsize ) ) || ( i >= I + Isize ) && ( ( j < J ) || ( j >= J + Jsize ) ) ) { // corner cells
00054         checkForCell(i, j, K-1, cornerNeighboursBackward);
00055         checkForCell(i, j, K,   cornerNeighboursModule);
00056         checkForCell(i, j, K+1, cornerNeighboursForward);
00057       }
00058       else { // rest should be direct neighbours
00059         checkForCell(i, j, K-1, directNeighboursBackward);
00060         checkForCell(i, j, K,   directNeighboursModule);
00061         checkForCell(i, j, K+1, directNeighboursForward);
00062       }
00063     }
00064 
00065     CellNeighbours *neighbours = new CellNeighbours(cellID);
00066     for (std::set<int>::iterator iter = directNeighboursModule.begin(); iter != directNeighboursModule.end(); ++iter )
00067     neighbours->addNeighbour( (*iter), CellNeighbours::direct, CellNeighbours::module );
00068 
00069     for (std::set<int>::iterator iter = directNeighboursForward.begin(); iter != directNeighboursForward.end(); ++iter )
00070     neighbours->addNeighbour( (*iter), CellNeighbours::direct, CellNeighbours::forward );
00071 
00072     for (std::set<int>::iterator iter = directNeighboursBackward.begin(); iter != directNeighboursBackward.end(); ++iter )
00073     neighbours->addNeighbour( (*iter), CellNeighbours::direct, CellNeighbours::backward );
00074 
00075     for (std::set<int>::iterator iter = cornerNeighboursModule.begin(); iter != cornerNeighboursModule.end(); ++iter )
00076     neighbours->addNeighbour( (*iter), CellNeighbours::corner, CellNeighbours::module );
00077 
00078     for (std::set<int>::iterator iter = cornerNeighboursForward.begin(); iter != cornerNeighboursForward.end(); ++iter )
00079     neighbours->addNeighbour( (*iter), CellNeighbours::corner, CellNeighbours::forward );
00080 
00081     for (std::set<int>::iterator iter = cornerNeighboursBackward.begin(); iter != cornerNeighboursBackward.end(); ++iter )
00082     neighbours->addNeighbour( (*iter), CellNeighbours::corner, CellNeighbours::backward );
00083 
00084     return neighbours;
00085   }
00086 
00087 
00088   lcio::LCCollection* CellNeighbourCalculator::getNeighbours() const {
00089 
00090     lcio::LCCollectionVec *collection = new lcio::LCCollectionVec(lcio::LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
00091 
00092     for ( CellIterator iter = _mapper->begin(); iter != _mapper->end(); ++iter ) {
00093 
00094       int cellID = (*iter);
00095 
00096       CellNeighbours *neighbours = getNeighbours(cellID);
00097 
00098       collection->addElement(neighbours);
00099     }
00100     return collection;
00101   }
00102 
00103   void CellNeighbourCalculator::getNeighbours(MappedContainer<CellNeighbours>* container) const {
00104 
00105     container->clear();
00106 
00107     for ( CellIterator iter = _mapper->begin(); iter != _mapper->end(); ++iter ) {
00108 
00109       int cellID = (*iter);
00110 
00111       CellNeighbours *neighbours = getNeighbours(cellID);
00112 
00113       container->fillByCellID(cellID,neighbours);
00114     }
00115 
00116   }
